alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of through 345 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Blanding, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of . This includes Utah 95 between mile markers 101 and 106, and between mile markers 113 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah
